dialogues.text: Seele, look, the drinks are ready!
I always feel like the drinks should be accompanied by tea snacks so that everyone can drink and chat... I wonder if they'll like this drink...
Catering for so many people? She sure knows how to create trouble for herself.
Chaotic and noisy... just thinking about it gives me a headache...
Seele, can I ask for your help?
Well, that's your guest, and I won't step in.
Hmm... What should I do then? I need someone to help me decorate the room, taste the dishes, and give me some feedback...
I'll help you, just this once...
That's great, Seele! Come taste it! Oh, by the way, I have some new ideas. After trying this one, I want to make some other drinks too!
Seele, I'm counting on you. I want to hear your honest opinion about it!
